metadata.title: Ship Any AI SaaS Startups in hours | ShipAny
metadata.description: ShipAny is a NextJS boilerplate for building AI SaaS startups, Ship Fast with a variety of templates and components.
metadata.keywords: ShipAny, AI SaaS Boilerplate, NextJS Boilerplate

api_keys.title: API Keys
api_keys.tip: Please keep your apikey safe to avoid leaks

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: News, resources, and updates about ShipAny

my_invites.no_orders: You can't invite others before you bought ShipAny

feedback.rating_tip: How do you feel about ShipAny?

metadata.title: Upload transcripts · AI meeting summary | Meeting Summary
metadata.description: Upload or paste meeting transcripts and let Gemini 3 Pro Preview deliver a structured report tailored for appliance leaders.

hero.title: Upload transcripts, receive a structured report in minutes
hero.subtitle: Drag & drop or paste raw notes. The AI removes filler words, rebuilds the logic, and outputs a five-layer report.

form.title: Meeting context
form.description: Extra context helps the model understand the scene and highlight priorities.
form.meeting_participants_placeholder: e.g. CEO Zhang, GM Li, Channel BU, Supplier A
form.meeting_focus_placeholder: Example: Align pricing rules, lock 618 incentive plan, call out supply chain risks.

transcript.title: Transcript body
transcript.description: Upload txt / md / srt text files or paste the raw transcript.
transcript.placeholder: Paste the transcript here. Speaker tags, numbers and product codes will improve the result.
transcript.limit_hint: Supports up to {max} characters. Split the file if it is longer.

upload.drop: Drag & drop a text file here, or
upload.file_tip: Word / PDF can be uploaded directly—we will convert them to text.

timeline.title: Processing flow
timeline.description: Each stage is tuned for appliance-industry use cases

collect.title: Collect materials
collect.description: Upload the transcript, add context, lock the meeting type

analyze.title: Semantic analysis
analyze.description: Gemini cleans filler words, extracts themes, quotes, and key numbers

deliver.title: Structured delivery
deliver.description: Five-layer summary + thematic breakdown, ready for sharing

guide.title: Prompt rules
guide.description: The model will strictly follow these writing instructions:
guide.bullet_1: De-verbalize: remove filler words, repetitions, and meaningless pauses.
guide.bullet_2: Rebuild the logic: reorganize by theme and importance, not by timeline.
guide.bullet_3: Keep vivid stories: preserve cases with concise retelling.
guide.bullet_4: Extract quotable lines: highlight the sentences that capture the core view.
guide.bullet_5: Layered delivery: one-line summary → key viewpoints → thematic breakdown → cards → meta analysis.

summary.title: AI summary
summary.description: Generated by Gemini 3 Pro Preview with the custom industry prompt.
summary.structured_hint: Delivered in the order of key theme / key points / thematic deep dive / cards / meta notes.
summary.empty_description: Upload your transcript and click “Generate structured summary” to see the report here.

toast.need_transcript: Please upload or paste a transcript first
toast.file_not_supported: Only txt / md / srt / vtt / docx / pdf files are supported right now
toast.content_too_long: Content exceeds {max} characters. Please split it.
toast.generate_failed: Failed to generate summary, please retry later
toast.parse_failed: Failed to parse the document. Please re-upload.
toast.parse_unsupported: This file type is not supported. Please upload txt / docx / pdf.
toast.export_failed: Export failed, please try again later

transcript_lab.sample_transcript:
Host: Morning everyone. Today’s channel strategy session focuses on two items: 618 pricing rules and the pressure from East China.
CEO Zhang: National sell-through in Q1 was +18% YoY, but East China only grew 5%. Price conflicts remain the main reason—some distributors dump flagship models online.
GM Li: During last week’s store tour, promoters in lower-tier cities had no idea about the 618 policy, so we lost orders to competitors.
Supplier A: Compressor supply is fine. What we need is an early purchase order. Please share the 618 forecast this week so we can prepare materials.
Marketing: Let’s introduce a tiered rebate. If a distributor hits 120% of target, bump the rebate from 3% to 4.5% to motivate them.
CEO Zhang: Got it. Send me the key account list tonight. The pricing framework must be locked this week.
